document_data.name: Call Lightning Storm
document_data.mainbody: '''''Call lightning storm''''' was a powerful [[evocation]] [[spell]] from the 5{{th}} circle of magic that dealt lightning damage. The spell could be used by [[druid]]s and [[shugenja]]s of [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.Effects: ''Call lightning storm'' was an empowered version of the ''[[call lightning]]'' spell. Each strike of lightning dealt increased damage and the caster could summon up to fifteen lightning strikes from the skies. The spell could be cast at a distance of {{SI|400|ft|long=yes}} and it increased with the caster's magical powers.
document_data.Components: The spell required only a [[somatic]] and [[verbal component]]s.

Notable Users.Individuals:
* [[Aerosclughpalar]], an old [[gold dragon]] druid of [[Teuveamanthaar]].
* [[Chazzar Ne]], an [[Uthgardt]] [[barbarian]] druid in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
* [[Lossarwyn]] the Ice Lich and a druid who preferred to use cold magic.
Notable Users.Creatures:
* [[Blue dragon]]s possessed an innate magical ability to ''call lightning storms.''
* [[Verdant prince]]s could cast ''call lightning storm'' once per day.
